t: Biotera vs Biolage: Which Brand Is Better For Hair – Videri Hair and Beauty
s: April 10, 2025 - Biolage is a hair care brand owned by Matrix. It has an extensive product line of hair color, conditioner, and shampoo. Its products have been praised for their salon-quality results and are generally considered to be safe for hair. However, some users have noted that Biolage shampoo leaves hair dry or frizzy. Both Biotera and Biolage products have received positive reviews on Amazon...
